title: Ask an Australian about still water swimming [Greek version]
creator_credit: Artransa Park Studios and Peter Lake
brief_description: A Greek family is having a picnic by the river, and the father explains to his young son the dangers of swimming in still water. The film then shows the rescue methods relevant to swimming pools, rivers and calm beaches. Note: In Greek.
